drizzle-box.description: This box comes with everything you need to start using smart contracts from a react app with Drizzle. It includes drizzle, drizzle-react and drizzle-react-components to give you a complete overview of Drizzle's capabilities.

drizzle-react-native-box.description: This box is to help get you started with building dapps with Drizzle on React Native.

vue-box.description: Starter box to begin your Drizzle Vue dapp.

pet-shop-box.description: A box containing all you need to get started with our Pet Shop tutorial.

tutorialtoken-box.description: A box containing all you need to get started with our OpenZeppelin (TutorialToken) tutorial.

blueprint-box.description: All you need to get started making your own Truffle Box!

vyper-example-box.description: A box containing all you need to get started with Vyper development on Truffle.

nightfall-box.description: A box to help get you started building dapps with Nightfall!

drizzle-kaleido-box.description: Truffle box to get up and running quickly with Drizzle & Truffle on a Kaleido chain.

truffle-kaleido-box.description: Truffle Box that comes ready to go with appropriate versions and config to connect to Kaleido chains.

angulartruffledapp.description: This Trufflebox provides a base for Truffle Framework and Angular √êAPP. and you can make transactions between accounts

angular-truffle-box.description: Truffle Box for Angular is a quick-and-easy way to get your Dapp on the road with Truffle and Angular

cheshire.description: A sandbox for CryptoKitties dApp developers

drizzle-tutorial-with-react-hooks.description: Drizzle tutorial. Drizzle is a reactive Ethereum datastore for dapp UIs.

etherplate.description: üîó Use this to make your next Ethereum DApp w/ React (& Router), Redux, Bulma & OpenZeppelin ERC721

eth-vue.description: This Truffle Box provides everything you need to quickly build Ethereum dApps that have authentication features with vue, including configuration for easy deployment to the Ropsten Network. It's also Gravatar-enabled. Connecting to a running Ganache blockchain network from Truffle is also possible -- for fast development and testing purposes. Built on Truffle 4, eth-vue uses vuex for state management, vuex-persist for local storage of app state, and vue-router for routing. Authentication functionalities are handled by Smart Contracts running on the Ethereum blockchain.

express-box.description: A truffle box to serve as the foundation of any Truffle and Express.js dApp.  This Box Uses NodeJS(Express JS) to provide API endpoints to the Ethereum Blockchain smart contract so that this smart contract can be used in Android Apps as well.

fluidity-truffle-box.description: Truffle box to give a skeleton for how Fluidity set up truffle and add-ons

HelloWorldBox.description: This truffle box could used for Dapp & ICO development with deployment. Ready to migrate with infura or local developement.

koa-trufflebox.description:
- Production grade lightweight JSON based logging utility
- configurable env's based on current NODE_ENV
- Error handling middlewares
- Easily pluggable controllers and routers
- The project structure is highly modular and can be directly used or extended for production purpose

macroverse-truffle-box.description: Truffle Box for projects building on Macroverse's shared world

peerai-api.description: Peerism's Peer.ai API built with Truffle, Node.js, Express.js, Solidity, and Ethereum TestRPC

rapid-box.description: A quick start truffle box to host REST APIs interacting with Smart Contracts

react-box-web3-todo.description: Truffle, Webpack, Web3, Redux and React boilerplate.

truffle-ci-box.description: Truffle box for quick integration with Travis CI and Coveralls

truffle-vue.description: A truffle box to serve as the foundation of any Truffle and Vue.js dApp. Comes with Vue.js, vue-router and Vuex.

vue-dark-chocolate.description: A truffle box that comes with everything you need to start using smart contracts from a Vue App, with Bootstrap styling and components. Supporting frameworks include Vuex, Vue-Router, Bootstrap 4 (via Bootstrap-Vue), and webpack. The sample uses webpack-dev-server for hot-reloading or you can build and serve from Express.

vueport-box.description: Truffle box with built in uPort self-sovereign identity authentication and contract interaction using VueJS. Inspired by https://github.com/truffle-box/react-uport-box
